attributes.action: ask Her Majesty not to give ex-Speaker Michael Martin a peerage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The House of Lords Appointments Commission has suggested that elevating Mr Martin, the first Speaker to be ousted in 300 years, would damage the reputation of the second chamber.   This seems to be a correct and fair conclusion based on Mr Martin's determination to frustrate the will of the people through attempting to prevent release of the expense details for MPs now released and his other scandalous conduct throughout his time in Office .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
